meanings: (맞서 이겨 내다) match, (어려운 상황 등을) cope with

vlive.korean: 저희가 세탁 당한다는 말을 좋아하나봐요. I think we like the word "washed". 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Replay] Sweden Laundry's Orgel Live - 스웨덴세탁소의 오르골 라이브!

vlive.korean: 우리 같이 오래한 사람들도 이런 경우를 당한다는 겁니다. Like us, people in the entertainment industry for this long can be cheated. 듣기 View video V Special : <빅픽처> 김종국&하하의 옥상눕방 라이브
vlive.english: Like us, people in the entertainment industry for this long can be cheated.

vlive.korean: 작은걸 노리다 크게 당한다는 말이 있죠. He'll lose more if he's aiming for the small one. 듣기 View video QUEEN : 제 1회 퀸씨배 인디알까기 최강자전 3화 <4강전 A조>
vlive.english: He'll lose more if he's aiming for the small one.

examples.korean: It was shocking that many children are bullied at school. 발음듣기 많은 아이들이 학교에서 괴롭힘을 당한다는 것은 충격이었다. Neungyule
examples.english: It was shocking that many children are bullied at school. 발음

examples.korean: Should teachers or parents get news that a child is bullying his or her peers, it is a clear warning that the adults in charge must step in and find out what is going wrong in that child's life. 발음듣기 아이가 따돌림 당한다는 사실을 교사 또는 부모가 발견한다면 이에 책임이 있는 성인은 꼭 관여하여 아이의 삶에 어떤 문제가 있는지 밝혀내야 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Should teachers or parents get news that a child is bullying his or her peers, it is a clear warning that the adults in charge must step in and find out what is going wrong in that child's life. 발음

examples.korean: It is bad enough to have one's own house burnt. 발음듣기 집이 화재를 당한다는 것은 참 쓰라린 일이다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: It is bad enough to have one's own house burnt. 발음

examples.korean: You can share whatever you’re feeling or thinking without fear of being rejected or ridiculed . 발음듣기 여러분은 거절 당하거나 조롱 당한다는 두려움 없이 여러분이 느끼고 생각하는 모든 것들을 함께 나눌 수 있어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: You can share whatever you’re feeling or thinking without fear of being rejected or ridiculed . 발음

examples.korean: This means the people there are being robbed. 발음듣기 그러니까 거기 사람들이 도난을 당한다는 거야. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. sherlator(sher****) Web Collection
